com.google.common.truth

Interface ExpectFailure.AssertionCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    ExpectFailure

    public static interface ExpectFailure.AssertionCallback
    A "functional interface" for ExpectFailure.expectFailure(com.google.common.truth.ExpectFailure.AssertionCallback) to invoke and capture failures.

    Java 8 users should pass a lambda to .expectFailure() rather than directly implement this interface. Java 7 users can define an @Rule ExpectFailure instance instead, however if you prefer the .expectFailure() pattern you can use this interface to pass in an anonymous class.
